events.name: CartItemAdded
events.description: This event triggers when an item is added to the cart.

events.name: CartItemRemoved
events.description: This event is raised when an item is removed from the cart.

events.name: CartItemPriceUpdated
events.description: This captures the event when the price of an item in the cart changes.

events.name: CartDiscountApplied
events.description: Indicates when a discount is applied to the cart.

events.name: CartPromotionApplied
events.description: Tracks when a promotional offer is applied to the cart.

commands.name: AddItem
commands.description: This event triggers when an item is added to the cart.

commands.name: RemoveItem
commands.description: This event is raised when an item is removed from the cart.

commands.name: UpdateItemPrice
commands.description: This captures the event when the price of an item in the cart changes.

commands.name: ApplyDiscount
commands.description: Indicates when a discount is applied to the cart.

commands.name: ApplyPromotion
commands.description: Tracks when a promotional offer is applied to the cart.

integrationPoints.name: InventoryManagement
integrationPoints.description: Integrate with inventory management to check stock levels when items are added.

integrationPoints.name: PaymentProcessing
integrationPoints.description: Integration with the payment processing system for checkout.

integrationPoints.name: CustomerNotification
integrationPoints.description: Notify customers about cart updates via email or SMS.

integrationPoints.name: OrderManagementSystem
integrationPoints.description: After checkout, integrate with the order management for order fulfillment.
